channel.title: Comments on: Vector field from data file

item.title: By: Nira
item.dc:creator: Nira
item.description: Hi All, This example is a so valuable one. I want to make a box around the graph. And is there anyway to change the color of the arrow based on the magnitude of vectors. Can anyone help for me please. thanks. Nira.
item.content:encoded: Hi All, This example is a so valuable one. I want to make a box around the graph. And is there anyway to change the color of the arrow based on the magnitude of vectors. Can anyone help for me please. thanks. Nira.

item.title: By: hagen
item.dc:creator: hagen
item.content:encoded:
Hi Doug.

I do not exactly know what you mean with “scale for arrow foll palette”, but you can try to change the line

unset colorbox

to

set colorbox

This will add a colorbox to your figure (have a look at this example) showing the scale used for the color of the arrows.

item.title: By: Doug
item.dc:creator: Doug
item.description: Thanks for the great example. I'm curious if gnuplot can also show a scale for arrow fill palette.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the great example. I’m curious if gnuplot can also show a scale for arrow fill palette.

item.title: By: Doug
item.dc:creator: Doug
item.description: Nevermind, I see the example file now. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Nevermind, I see the example file now. Thanks!
